overview: From the heart of the working-class neighborhood of Villa Soldati (Buenos Aires) for more than 30 years that a band of veteran rockers continues to work for a desire that dampens the hard life that they were so lucky: to live from music, to live from the art of composing songs and blow them up in a football stadium. "Sue単os de rock" is a documentary that tells the story of Vorax, the Argentine heavy metal band that makes difficulties, tools to move forward.
title: Sue単os de rock
